title: Begin Classes
content: A structured, step-by-step approach for new students or those returning to yoga after a break. Focuses on building foundational knowledge of Iyengar yoga. Not suitable for those with chronic conditions or major injuries.

title: General Classes
content: For students with some yoga experience who are comfortable with basic inversions and want to deepen their practice.

title: Experienced Classes
content: For advanced practitioners who are confident with inversions and want to explore more challenging poses and techniques.

title: Yoga Therapy Group Classes
content: Specialized classes for specific body areas like Knees & Hips, and Neck & Back. These classes focus on therapeutic applications of yoga.

title: Yoga Therapy Personal Sessions
content: One-on-one sessions for students with significant injuries or health conditions. These sessions provide personalized therapeutic guidance.
